models.name: todo_list_users
models.description: User accounts managing authentication and task ownership in the todo application. Each user maintains exclusive control over their personal todo tasks with secure login capabilities.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: User's email address for authentication. Must be unique across all users.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Securely hashed password for user authentication and login functionality.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was initially created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the most recent user account update.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for user account deactivation. Null indicates active account.

models.name: todo_list_tasks
models.description: Todo task entities owned by authenticated users with full CRUD operations including creation, completion tracking, and permanent deletion.

foreignFields.name: todo_list_user_id
foreignFields.description: Owned user of this task {@link todo_list_users.id}.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Optional task description limited to 500 characters.

plainFields.name: completed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when task was marked as completed.
